44 // The unusual include macro below is done this way because xerces
45 // #defines EXCEPTION_HPP in their own exception class header file.
46 #ifndef GPSTK_EXCEPTION_HPP
47 #define GPSTK_EXCEPTION_HPP
48 
49 #include <cstdlib>
50 #include <iostream>
51 #include <vector>
52 #include <string>
53 
54 namespace gpstk
55 {
67  class ExceptionLocation
70  {
71  public:
78  ExceptionLocation(const std::string& filename = std::string(),
79  const std::string& funcName = std::string(),
80  const unsigned long& lineNum = 0)
81  : fileName(filename), functionName(funcName),
82  lineNumber(lineNum)
83  { }
84 
88  ~ExceptionLocation() {}
89 
91  std::string getFileName() const
92  { return fileName; }
94  std::string getFunctionName() const
95  { return functionName; }
97  unsigned long getLineNumber() const
98  { return lineNumber; }
99 
104  void dump(std::ostream& s) const;
105 
107  std::string what() const;
108 
118  friend std::ostream& operator<<( std::ostream& s,
119  const ExceptionLocation& e );
120 
121  private:
123  std::string fileName;
125  std::string functionName;
127  unsigned long lineNumber;
128  }; // class ExceptionLocation
129 
150  class Exception
151  {
152  public:
154  enum Severity
155  {
156  unrecoverable,
157  recoverable
158  };
159 
164  Exception();
165 
173  Exception(const std::string& errorText,
174  const unsigned long& errorId = 0,
175  const Severity& severity = unrecoverable);
176 
177 
185  Exception(const char* errorText,
186  const unsigned long& errorId = 0,
187  const Severity& severity = unrecoverable);
188 
189 
191  Exception(const Exception& exception);
192 
194  ~Exception()
195  {};
196 
198  Exception& operator=(const Exception& e);
199 
207  void terminate()
208  { exit(1); };
209 
211  unsigned long getErrorId() const
212  { return errorId; };
213 
219  Exception& setErrorId(const unsigned long& errId)
220  { errorId = errId; return *this; };
221 
234  Exception& addLocation(const ExceptionLocation& location);
235 
242  const ExceptionLocation getLocation(const size_t& index=0) const;
243 
246  size_t getLocationCount() const;
247 
253  bool isRecoverable() const
254  { return (severity == recoverable); }
255 
261  Exception& setSeverity(const Severity& sever)
262  { severity = sever; return *this; };
263 
269  Exception& addText(const std::string& errorText);
270 
279  std::string getText(const size_t& index=0) const;
280 
282  size_t getTextCount() const;
283 
285  std::string getName() const
286  { return "Exception"; };
287 
292  void dump(std::ostream& s) const;
293 
295  std::string what() const;
296 
305  friend std::ostream& operator<<( std::ostream& s,
306  const Exception& e );
307 
308  protected:
310  unsigned long errorId;
312  std::vector<ExceptionLocation> locations;
314  Severity severity;
316  std::vector<std::string> text;
317 
326  int overflow(int c);
327 
328  private:
330  std::string streamBuffer;
331  }; // class Exception

334 } // namespace gpstk

336 
347 #if defined ( __FUNCTION__ )
348 #define FILE_LOCATION gpstk::ExceptionLocation(__FILE__, __FUNCTION__, __LINE__)
349 #else
350 #define FILE_LOCATION gpstk::ExceptionLocation(__FILE__, "", __LINE__)
351 #endif
352 
353 // For compilers without exceptions, die if you get an exception.
354 #if defined (NO_EXCEPTIONS_SUPPORT)
355 #define GPSTK_THROW(exc) { exc.addLocation(FILE_LOCATION); exc.terminate(); }
358 #define GPSTK_RETHROW(exc) { exc.addLocation(FILE_LOCATION); exc.terminate(); }
361 #else
362 #define GPSTK_THROW(exc) { exc.addLocation(FILE_LOCATION); throw exc; }
365 #define GPSTK_RETHROW(exc) { exc.addLocation(FILE_LOCATION); throw; }
368 #endif
369

371 
381 #define NEW_EXCEPTION_CLASS(child, parent) \
382 class child : public parent \
383 { \
384 public: \
385  \
386  child() : parent() {} \
387  \
388  child(const child& a): parent(a) {} \
389  \
390  child(const gpstk::Exception& a) : parent(a) {}; \
391  \
397  child(const std::string& a, unsigned long b = 0,\
398  gpstk::Exception::Severity c = gpstk::Exception::unrecoverable) \
399  : parent(a, b, c) \
400  {};\
401  \
407  child(const char* a, unsigned long b = 0,\
408  gpstk::Exception::Severity c = gpstk::Exception::unrecoverable) \
409  : parent(a, b, c) \
410  {};\
411  \
412  ~child() {} \
413  \
414  std::string getName() const {return ( # child);} \
415  \
416  child& operator=(const child& kid) \
417  { parent::operator=(kid); return *this; } \
418  \
419  friend std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& s, const child& c) \
420  { c.dump(s); return s; } \
421 }
422 
423 namespace gpstk
424 {
427  NEW_EXCEPTION_CLASS(InvalidParameter, Exception);
428 
431  NEW_EXCEPTION_CLASS(InvalidRequest, Exception);
432 
435  NEW_EXCEPTION_CLASS(AssertionFailure, Exception);
436 
439  NEW_EXCEPTION_CLASS(AccessError, Exception);
440 
443  NEW_EXCEPTION_CLASS(IndexOutOfBoundsException, Exception);
444 
447  NEW_EXCEPTION_CLASS(InvalidArgumentException, Exception);
448 
451  NEW_EXCEPTION_CLASS(ConfigurationException, Exception);
452 
455  NEW_EXCEPTION_CLASS(FileMissingException, Exception);
456 
459  NEW_EXCEPTION_CLASS(SystemSemaphoreException, Exception);
460 
463  NEW_EXCEPTION_CLASS(SystemPipeException, Exception);
464 
467  NEW_EXCEPTION_CLASS(SystemQueueException, Exception);
468 
471  NEW_EXCEPTION_CLASS(OutOfMemory, Exception);
472 
475  NEW_EXCEPTION_CLASS(ObjectNotFound, AccessError);
476 
479  NEW_EXCEPTION_CLASS(NullPointerException, Exception);
480 
483  NEW_EXCEPTION_CLASS(UnimplementedException, Exception);
484 
485 } // namespace gpstk
